slides.title: Welcome to Our Weekly Update
slides.content: This week we're focusing on our Q1 achievements and upcoming initiatives for Q2. Our team has made significant progress across all departments.

slides.title: Upcoming Initiatives
items: Launch new customer portal with enhanced features

slides.title: Team Spotlight
slides.content: Congratulations to the Development team for successfully launching our new mobile app ahead of schedule! Special recognition goes to Sarah Chen for leading this initiative.
